requirements.description: The app shall present a landing view summarizing cleaning services with a primary 'Book Now' action leading into the booking flow.
acceptance_criteria: Landing view displays hero section summarizing core cleaning offerings on load.
'Book Now' primary button is visible without scrolling on standard viewport.
Selecting 'Book Now' transitions the user to the booking wizard Step 1 without page reload.

requirements.description: The app shall allow customers to choose a cleaning service category from interactive cards.
acceptance_criteria: At least three service categories are displayed as selectable cards.
Selecting a card visually highlights the chosen category.
The chosen category is retained when navigating to subsequent booking steps.

requirements.description: The app shall let customers choose optional service add-ons via toggles.
acceptance_criteria: Add-on options are shown with descriptive labels and price impacts.
Toggling an add-on updates the selection state immediately.
Selected add-ons persist through to the booking summary.

requirements.description: The app shall present a step indicator showing progress through the booking wizard.
acceptance_criteria: Step indicator displays all booking steps by name.
Current step is visually distinguished from upcoming steps.
Completed steps are indicated as finished once the user advances.

requirements.description: The app shall allow customers to choose preferred cleaning duration.
acceptance_criteria: Duration options are presented as selectable inputs.
Only one duration can be active at a time.
Selected duration is reflected in real-time price estimate.

requirements.description: The app shall provide a date and time slot picker for scheduling the cleaning appointment.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can select a calendar date from an interactive widget.
Available time slots for the selected date are displayed without reloading.
Chosen date and time slot are summarized before confirmation.

requirements.description: The app shall collect customer contact information before booking submission.
acceptance_criteria: Form includes required fields for full name, email, and phone number.
Attempting to proceed without required fields triggers inline validation.
Valid entries populate the booking summary's contact section.

requirements.description: The app shall capture service address and entry instructions.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can enter street address, unit details, and zip code.
Optional text area allows additional instructions for cleaners.
Address information is displayed in the confirmation summary.

requirements.description: The app shall generate a dynamic pricing estimate based on the booking selections.
acceptance_criteria: Price summary updates instantly when service type changes.
Add-on selections modify the price estimate accordingly.
Final estimate is shown on the review screen prior to confirmation.

requirements.description: The app shall present a booking review screen summarizing all selections before confirmation.
acceptance_criteria: Review screen lists service category, duration, date/time, add-ons, and price.
Contact and address details are displayed for verification.
'Confirm Booking' action is available only from the review screen.

requirements.description: The app shall generate a confirmation view with a unique booking reference after submission.
acceptance_criteria: Upon confirmation, a unique alphanumeric reference is displayed.
Confirmation view reiterates key booking details.
Users can navigate from confirmation to 'My Bookings' view.

requirements.description: The app shall store confirmed bookings in client-side session for later viewing within the prototype.
acceptance_criteria: Each confirmed booking is appended to the 'My Bookings' list immediately.
Switching between app sections retains the stored bookings.
Booking entries include reference, service type, date/time, and status.

requirements.description: The app shall allow customers to cancel a booking from the 'My Bookings' list while keeping history.
acceptance_criteria: 'Cancel' action is available for pending bookings.
Cancelling updates the booking status to 'Cancelled' without deleting the entry.
Cancelled bookings are visually styled differently from active bookings.

requirements.description: The app shall allow users to mark a completed booking as done.
acceptance_criteria: Each booking entry includes a 'Complete' action.
Activating 'Complete' changes booking status to 'Completed' in the list.
Completed bookings remain visible but are visually distinguished.

requirements.description: The app shall allow users to duplicate an existing booking into a new draft.
acceptance_criteria: 'Duplicate' action is available per booking entry.
Selecting duplicate opens the booking wizard prefilled with original selections.
New confirmation assigns a fresh booking reference even when duplicated.

requirements.description: The app shall support filtering bookings by status (Pending, Completed, Cancelled).
acceptance_criteria: Status filter control lists Pending, Completed, Cancelled, and All options.
Selecting a status filters the displayed bookings accordingly.
Resetting to 'All' shows the full booking list again.

requirements.description: The app shall provide an expandable booking detail view for each entry.
acceptance_criteria: Each booking card includes a 'View Details' trigger.
Trigger opens an overlay or expanded section showing full booking information.
Closing the details view returns to the list without losing context.

requirements.description: The app shall include a contact form for service inquiries accessible from navigation.
acceptance_criteria: Contact form collects name, email, subject, and message.
Submitting the contact form displays success feedback within the interface.
Form is accessible from main navigation without leaving the page.

requirements.description: The app shall allow users to edit any aspect of an existing booking before its scheduled date.
acceptance_criteria: 'Edit' action opens the booking wizard with original data prefilled.
Users can modify service category, add-ons, duration, date, time, and contact info.
Saving edits updates the booking summary while retaining the same reference ID.

requirements.description: The app shall enable users to manage multiple saved service addresses for quick selection.
acceptance_criteria: Users can add more than one address to a saved list.
Saved addresses persist within the session and appear as selectable options during booking.
Users can delete or rename saved addresses from the profile panel.

requirements.description: The app shall provide a drag-and-drop interface to reschedule bookings on a calendar view.
acceptance_criteria: 'My Bookings' includes a calendar grid displaying each booking as a draggable item.
Dragging a booking to a new slot updates its date/time instantly.
System confirms the new schedule while maintaining other booking details.

requirements.description: The app shall support applying multiple promo codes per booking with cumulative discounts.
acceptance_criteria: Booking form allows entry of more than one promo code.
Each valid code updates the price summary with individual discount lines.
Users can remove applied codes individually before confirmation.

requirements.description: The app shall display a status timeline for each booking covering Requested, Confirmed, En Route, In Progress, and Completed stages.
acceptance_criteria: Booking details view includes a timeline with at least five stages.
Current stage is highlighted based on booking status data.
Timeline updates automatically when the booking status changes.

requirements.description: The app shall provide sharing options to send booking confirmations via email and messaging apps.
acceptance_criteria: Confirmation view includes dedicated share controls for email and messaging.
Selecting email opens a pre-populated mail template with booking details.
Selecting messaging copies a summarized booking link to clipboard and indicates success.

requirements.description: The app shall allow customers to assign a preferred cleaner profile to their booking.
acceptance_criteria: 'Select Cleaner' step lists available cleaners with profiles.
User can choose a preferred cleaner before confirmation.
Selected cleaner is stored with the booking and shown in the summary.

requirements.description: The app shall present real-time cleaner location tracking on the booking confirmation page.
acceptance_criteria: Confirmation page includes a live map component.
Map shows the cleaner's current location updating at least every 30 seconds.
Location updates stop when the booking is marked completed.

requirements.description: The app shall support scheduling recurring bookings in a single flow.
acceptance_criteria: Booking wizard includes recurrence frequency options such as weekly or bi-weekly.
Users can set start date and number of occurrences.
Summary lists all future occurrences with dates and times.

requirements.description: The app shall let users export a booking to their personal calendar via downloadable ICS file.
acceptance_criteria: Confirmation view offers an 'Export to Calendar' action.
Action generates an ICS file containing booking details.
Downloaded ICS file contains correct date, time, and address.

requirements.description: The app shall capture a digital signature from the cleaner or customer upon completion.
acceptance_criteria: Completion workflow includes a signature canvas input.
Captured signature image is attached to the booking record.
Signature is viewable from the booking details panel.

requirements.description: The app shall support full localization with a language toggle for English and Spanish interfaces.
acceptance_criteria: Global language toggle is accessible from the header.
Switching language updates all visible text content without reloading the page.
User's language preference persists for the session.
